Articles.Content:
Sup.

Re-installing on a new machine and I'm trying to get all my old mods from my previous install, and with 1.3 dropping I'm having enough issues with that as it is. But I've come upon another issue in finding a mod that seems to have vanished, and I can't for the life of me remember the name of it.

It's not Hangar Extender, although it does something very similar. At the click of a UI button with two arrows pointing out, the VAB or SPH walls/floor/etc would disappear, leaving just the grass to build upon. Clicking the UI again (however now the arrows would be pointing in) and the walls would reappear. I prefer this method for building large vehicles and would like to try and find this mod before having to use Hangar Extender. That's just me being picky. I have no screenshots of the actual UI button (unfortunately) but the icons looked as such. Any help in jogging my memory on what the hell this thing is called would be much appreciated. 

Cheers.

that's definitely Hanger Extender. Look at the toolbar buttons

https://github.com/Alewx/FShangarExtender/blob/master/For Release/FShangarExtender/FShangarExtenderIconExtend.png

https://github.com/Alewx/FShangarExtender/blob/master/For Release/FShangarExtender/FShangarExtenderIconShrink.png
Huh. I had installed HE but no such icons showed up so I figured it couldn't be. Maybe I installed wrong. My bad, as you were.
